backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining publication status controls, user roles, lesson/assignment/report-card types, and admin-gated publish/unpublish functions with runtime traps for unauthorized access.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, focusing on routing, role-gating, React Query hooks, UI components, and premium/report-card logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variables defining light/dark color schemes, global background/foreground styles, and shared border/input/ring tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page defining metadata, PWA manifest links, Apple touch settings, and script bootstrapping for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, categories, and start URL for Homeschool Hub K-12.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing static and dynamic caching, network-first rules for backend API calls, offline fallback, and cache cleanup logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring router, query client, theme provider, and index route logic for identity handling, publication checks, profile setup, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublication: Renders admin-only controls to publish or unpublish the app, including a reason form and loading states. Uses query hooks to manage publication status mutations.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentsTab.t: Displays student assignments and provides dialogs for submitting, grading, and creating assignments. Integrates lesson selection, validation, and mutation hooks for assignment actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai. Includes a heart icon for branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app branding, theme toggle, login/logout actions, and offline indicator. Uses Internet Identity and React Query cleanup on logout.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompts with iOS-specific guidance and dismissal persistence. Shows a card prompting users to install the app when eligible.
frontend/src/components/LessonPlansTab.t: Provides UI for listing, creating, uploading, or AI‑generating lesson plans. Supports subject selection, library imports, file parsing, and saving via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows temporary alerts when the user goes offline or comes back online. Listens to PWA connectivity state and animates indicators accordingly.
Implements a multi-step onboarding dialog with localStorage tracking and feature/subject previews including premium upsell content.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBanner.ts: Displays a premium upsell alert when the user lacks premium access and triggers the upgrade flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a profile creation form with name and role selection, auto-locking role based on sign-in type.
frontend/src/components/ProgressTab.tsx: Shows assignment completion, overall grade averages, and summary stats for a student's progress.
frontend/src/components/ReportCardsTab.t: Handles premium status, report card generation, Stripe checkout, and subscription management UI.
frontend/src/components/RoleSignInButton: Renders educator/parent and student sign-in buttons, storing sign-in type before triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Modal form for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries, submitting via useSetStripeConfiguration.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines the app name, short name, and tagline used for branding.
frontend/src/constants/premiumPricing.ts: Defines premium report card pricing constants and provides a helper to generate checkout items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWA.ts: Tracks PWA install state, network status, and service worker update availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations like profiles, publication status, and admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables for theming, dark mode, and scrolling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabs for lessons, assignments, progress, and reports, plus onboarding and premium features.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with dynamic preview content, sign‑in options, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Shows a cancellation message after a failed payment and provides navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success message after payment, refreshes premium access, and links back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Takedown.tsx: Displays a maintenance/unavailable notice with optional reason and admin publication controls.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Detects authorization errors and returns standardized user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/lessonUpload.ts: Provides helpers for validating lesson file types, generating titles, reading text files, and formatting upload errors.
frontend/src/utils/signInType.ts: Stores and retrieves the user’s pre‑login sign‑in type in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining content paths, theme extensions (colors, radius, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing feature requirements for role-specific sign-in and maintenance-mode behavior.
